dt-option.name: keys.tabIndex
dt-option.summary: Set the table's tab index for when it will receive focus

type.description: The tab index for the table. Like all other tab indexes, this can be -1 to disallow tabbing into the table.

dt-option.default: Use the same tab index as DataTables (`dt-init tabIndex`)
dt-option.description: Browser's have complex built in algorithms that define which element will receive focus when the _tab_ key is pressed by the end user. The [tab index attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement/tabIndex) for HTML elements can be used to control this behaviour, focusing focus to follow a route defined by the developer rather than the end user. This option can be used to define the tab index of the KeyTable enhanced DataTable in the documents tab flow.

example.title: Take the table out of the normal tab flow in the browser
